text: The new wave of new wave (NWONW) was a term coined by music journalists to describe a subgenre of the British alternative rock scene in the early 1990s, in which bands displayed post-punk and new wave influences, particularly from bands such as The Clash, Blondie, XTC, Devo, Squeeze, Joe Jackson, Split Enz, Wire, and the Stranglers. ==Notable artists== *Bis *Done Lying Down *Echobelly *Elastica *Menswear *Shed Seven *S*M*A*S*H *These Animal Men Category:New wave Category:Rock music
title: New wave of new wave
